website_summaries.verdict: Customers needing an extra-large house for bigger breeds should check out this attractive model.
pros: Can be purchased in extra-large, large, and medium sizes
Durable plastic build with an all-weather, sturdy design
Customers appreciated the product's easy assembly
cons: Thin plastic can result in cracks from heavy use

customer_reviews.title: BIG dog? BIG dog house! Great!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome dog house! Bought two. Hold our 85 pound lab and 94 pound husky mix individually and they could squeeze in one if they really wanted to although they would have to really like to snuggle! It’s tall and door is as well which we liked. They go in and out easily. Like the elevated floor so no water enters. We used thick Velcro strips to put down a thick shag rug so we can remove to clean but they won’t drag out. Great price. I don’t know why people complained about flooring as has four supports and it doesn’t buckle under our dogs weight.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money, and they were very inexpensive! Easy to assemble, just follow the directions included. It took my rottweilers a couple of weeks out in the rain to finally give the house a try, but after 1 finally broke down and got in, then the other beast quickly followed into his own new home. Now they enjoy them, and haven't even attempted to chew or tear the houses up! I am impressed!!! My dogs are both huge dogs, 150 and 170 pounds and easily fit in this XL dog house with room to turn around without problems and lie comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: ladygardener

customer_reviews.title: Deceitful description... Not for your Great Dane... Not Weather proof... Cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying how disappointed I am with this purchase. From afar I knew it was a mistake. My senior Great Dane would not be able to fit in this house, Period. The material is cheap, definitely not worth the price of $129. I looked inside, and the house is wet from the showers we had. I am taking it down and sending back.
customer_reviews.author: A.Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this dog house and it very poor product. The plastic is flimsy and confirming previos previews saying it leaks. It hasn’t rained but I already see the holes in the roof where it will leak. The plastic is very thin. I provided pics to show the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy plastic
customer_reviews.text: Package delivered doubled taped. Box was destroyed, plastic seemed ok until we took it out of the box and tried putting it together. Both sides of the house were curved in which made it hard to assemble. Once it was together my dog liked it but it's not very sturdy....
customer_reviews.author: Pretty Little Witchcraft

customer_reviews.title: This dog house is supposedly "XL" and the base bowed ...
customer_reviews.text: This dog house is supposedly "XL" and the base bowed when stepped on and felt very cheap...Just a matter of time with the weather for it to crack and my dog drops the 4" to the ground through broken plastic... The walls came and were bowed in two directions so It was impossible to connect them to the door and roof. Very flimsy plastic, not nearly worth the money. Will be returning!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Z.

customer_reviews.title: Just got it today, so far so good
customer_reviews.text: Item just arrived today, and I was a little nervous about putting it together myself but it was actually pretty easy! Took about 30 mins by myself. I got the XL and its bug enough for my 2 labs, and 2 chihuahuas (not all at the same time). We'll see how it holds up outside, but so far I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: havok

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected
customer_reviews.text: This is no "outdoor winter house" there's no insulation my dogs would freeze in it if i left them over night with this Colorado winter... I'm only keeping it because i don't want to go thru the hassle of sending out back but i will be ordering another outdoor winter house. On the positive side i put it together my self in under 30 mins and my two 3 mo old German Sheppard pups fit in it for now
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is a piece of crap. doesn't just "click" together
customer_reviews.text: this is a piece of crap. doesn't just "click" together, it has to be screwed. nothing lined up, walls were warped, very thin plastic. I got this for my turkey and it will serve it's purpose only worth maybe $25 at best.
customer_reviews.author: Oddfarm

customer_reviews.title: very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really nice dog house. Nicer construction than others that we have had. We wanted XL and this is bigger than the others than we had seen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this house
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this house as I do. The only thing is it's somewhat light weight , so the north wind blew it off of my front porch and into the yard . Thankfully the dog wasn't in it (he's 14 years old) All in all great product . Be sure u assemble it outdoors or u won't be able to fit it through the door to bring it outside .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: I was not able to get the sides to click into the roof properly, but the base is solid, and my 150 lb goat fits into it. That's what I wanted....something to keep the rain and wind off him, and it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: olotsodogs

customer_reviews.title: " Outdoor Winter House" it is Not
customer_reviews.text: What a flimsy piece of plastic. I've already assembled it and threw away the box. I walk with a cane and cannot figure a way to return it or I would. Instructions are wrong. When assembling, pictograph instructions shows back wall instead of front door and vice versa. Really?!? You didn't notice? What if English is not the customer's first language ? They would be trying to assemble it incorrectly. Also side walls arrived bowed. Also, it is advertised as an " Outdoor Winter House". It is clearly not. I do not believe it will give comfort to my dog below 40 degrees F. I'm not talking about sub-freezing. Just 30-ish.Temps above 40 is not "winter".
customer_reviews.author: KLM606

customer_reviews.title: One solution...
customer_reviews.text: We needed a product to put on a somewhat sheltered deck JUST to give the dog shelter from rain and snow if we weren't at home. The house was easy to assemble and place. Seems to be great for the situation we have.
customer_reviews.author: Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Size does matter
customer_reviews.text: the dog house is nice and sturdy BUT my rott is 143 lbs and this house is too small for him. He always lays in the house with his head sticking out
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone

customer_reviews.title: The base was cracked. It is advertised as "Outdoor ...
customer_reviews.text: The base was cracked. It is advertised as "Outdoor Winter House" it is made of thin plastic with no insulation whatsoever. PLEASE; do not leave your dog outside in this house during Winter! "Frequently bought together", I ordered the crate pad and the plastic door; the latter is for FLAT ROOF; the dog house has PEAKED ROOF!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Manivel

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy and may not be suitable for big and active ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it today and it appears it is a used product as there are dog hairs on flooring piece. See photos. Not sturdy and may not be suitable for big and active dog.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I bought the dog house for my Cane Corso, It was easy to assemble. I posted a step by step video on youtube, just search for it Confidence XL Pet Dog house assembly. Cool looking dog house. While assembling it was flimsy but when it's finished becomes sturdy. Also when I finished putting it together rain has started and no rain inside, but because there was no door the rain got in from front door side. Will recommend for the price... although it would have been nice if it had a shade or cap to cover the front door from wind driven rain to get inside.
customer_reviews.author: iGagJan

customer_reviews.title: Big and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Great dog house! I bought it for my neighbor's dog and it's held up really well. He's able to get in it without knocking it over like he did the smaller one he had. As far as assembly, the dad put it together easily, but I didn't see if it took a lot of work or not.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Smith

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay.
customer_reviews.text: Although the description says water resistant, this is not water resistant at all. I think the water seeps in through the house. It was sort of easy to assemble, but it does look great. I am just disappointed that the house isn’t water resisitant, however you can use that flex tape stuff to seal in the house where it leaks and then it should stay up pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase and would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Read assembly instructions! I did not and lost the battle. :) Once I read instructions, assembly was simple and the dog house is very durable and quite large. Pleased with purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a chip out of one of the corners. The plastic was very flimsy and was difficult to assemble secondary to be so flimsy and a little warped.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: XL Waterproof Doghouse for chickens
customer_reviews.text: I am using the XL Waterproof Doghouse inside my chicken yard as an additional spot for the chickens to come in from the rain if they choose, besides their main chicken house which they go in each night. This doghouse is waterproof and made well, although the box arrived a little "rough" with a couple gouges. My husband put the house together within about 20 minutes. I added a "base" inside of it which chickens like of dirt, straw and shavings. They walked right in and think its pretty cool. Spoiled chickens lay better eggs.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy which is a plus. My german shepherd likes this type of dog house over the igloo one which is more expensive and sturdy but he never went in so we sold the igloo and got this. The reason I gave three stars is because one side of the roof came warped and you can't bend it or hammer it down or the plastic will break and because the instructions werent great. FYI I hav extra pieces coz I could not find where the two long pointy things that look like spikes go. I think they are screw covers that servean additional purpose but the house seems fine without it.
customer_reviews.author: amazon_buyer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely NOT water proof 😠
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these because we have big dogs outside (Mastiff and a "Heinz 57"). We were under the assumption that this was an XL dog house, boy were we mistaken. Good thing we bought 2. Both of our dogs go into one house and barely have enough room to move. Furthermore, do NOT buy if you live in an area where it rains, because it is NOT water proof. We spent over $200 for flimsy plastic. The details of this product is complete and utterly worthless! If we could give a negative star we would. Extremely disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris hickman

customer_reviews.title: ... cracked and broken when I got it and looked like it was re package and sent to me I ...
customer_reviews.text: Dog house was cracked and broken when I got it and looked like it was re package and sent to me I made the best of it because it would have been an inconvenience to me to send back
customer_reviews.author: darryl mack

customer_reviews.title: Great dog house
customer_reviews.text: I got this house for my 2 minipigs. It’s HUGE!!! My pigs are both full grown adults. I probably should’ve gotten a smaller model. They have a ton of space to lay in there comfortably. The only issue that I had with this house was the screw holes. You have to drill holes in order to be able to actually insert the screws because the premade holes are way to small.
customer_reviews.author: S. C.

customer_reviews.title: I Never buy from this co. Again.
customer_reviews.text: This is what I received. It is never going to be a winter dog house. A lot of headaches to return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: We only got use out of this for about 1 month. It was not very hard to put together but it cracked within a month & is not water resistant. Wanted to send it back but was 3 days over the time limit! Such a waste of money, it is no longer able to be used so we trashed it. Huge waste of money, don’t waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy Boyland

customer_reviews.title: Not for cold weather/hail/high wind areas
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize it's a terrible option for cold weather and high wind areas. Even if I used the stakes the wind would blow it away. probably good for moderate to warm weather. FYI don't use if you're needing cold weather protection, rain protection, or experience high winds and can't tether it well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C

customer_reviews.title: Nice big dog house for my 2 Pittys!!
customer_reviews.text: I have two 80 lb. PIt Bulls and they love their new house and they say "thank you" Confidence for our new home. I put the kennel together in about 30-45 minutes and was not in a hurry. Just a matter of fitting the plastic parts together and then applying the screws. Looks nice and has a nice raised floor. I plan to put a heating pad inside with a comfy cushion on top to get the Pitties through the winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Mack

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem puppy proof.
customer_reviews.text: Before I'd even finished installing it, I could tell it wouldn't withstand the Puppy Test. My pups mutilated our last kennel, and it was wooden! Imagine what they'd do to this flimsy plastic shack! I returned this product immediately and bought an old fashioned Igloo Kennel from our local feed store. Maybe if I had an older dog, this kennel would have made more sense.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Solorzano

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My Labrador hates this house! She won’t go in it even if we put her food inside since day one. We have kept it hoping she will. definitely big I went inside it 5.3 110 pounds hoping she would go in and there was still enough room for her lol! Good product even if my dog doesn’t think so
customer_reviews.author: Bella Reed

customer_reviews.title: STURDY AND EASY TO ASSEMBLE
customer_reviews.text: This dog house was very easy to assemble. All the slots and screw holes were lined up so everything fit together perfectly. The construction is sturdy but it is still lightweight. We have a 120 lb Great Pyrenees and he walks in and out easily. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Bronowicz

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy. Believe the reviews on how thin the plastic is. I am sending back.
customer_reviews.author: J Jones

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for a Doberman
customer_reviews.text: My 110 lb Doberman fits with lots of room to spare. Fairly easy to assemble with two ppl as you need to tug and pull a lot because the holes don’t line up for the screws. Mine is in an enclosed pen with side enclosures and a roof but I wouldn’t trust it alone in the rain or wind. It only has a few screws holding it together and a small hole in the middle of the roof. Also, it’s light enough that it may tumble away.
customer_reviews.author: mab

customer_reviews.title: too expensive
customer_reviews.text: I paid around $120 and when it came, there was a piece already broken! My husband did not understand why I would get something so flimsy but the reviews were good on it so that's why I purchased it. Just by looking at it, I don't think it was worth $120 but rather than deal with customer service for the broken piece, or try to return it, we just made it work. Our German Shepherd seems to like it. He doesn't use it all of the time just some times. I do like how it looks though and he did jump on the roof and it didn't break so that's a plus considering he is every bit of 100 lbs!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Great in Florida 3 digit temperature
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my 76 Ibs dog cool during the day in temp above 100 degrees. I like that the floor is not flat on the ground which prevent the heat from the concrete to penetrate the house. The unit assemble easily and quickly with two people. Withstand humidity and moisture. Great built and look!
customer_reviews.author: Raquel P.

customer_reviews.title: Confidence Pet Waterproof Dog House
customer_reviews.text: Once put together, it is a very handsome dog house. Had some small issues with the instructions but managed to put it together with assistance of my wife. Looks good and my Great Pyreaneese Loves it!
customer_reviews.author: SMITTY

customer_reviews.title: Good-quality, attractive dog house!
customer_reviews.text: My granddog loves this durable, sturdy, attractive dog house. We ordered this after two failed attempts at wooden dog houses, both which arrived damaged or with missing parts. The extra-large size is perfect, and gives him room to grow. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DCWRose

customer_reviews.title: Great house for fur kid
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the XL for my 100lb Doberman because he’s tall and wouldn’t go in the Igloo dome house I first purchased for him. At first I thought it would be too flimsy but after putting it together found it pretty sturdy. Easy to assemble with two people. My dog loves it! Put a cushion bed in there for him and he still has plenty of room. Looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bit expensive for a very basic doghouse
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because there weren't any other options available that fit my needs and frankly, I wouldn't risk trying to build something myself. I actually purchased this to use as a goose house. The geese still haven't decided to use it, but my ducks and chickens go in to lay their eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: VERY LARGE
customer_reviews.text: THIS ITEM IS VERY LARGE AND FAIRLY SIMPLE TO ASSEMBLE. I AM COMPLETELY SATISFIED WITH THIS SELLER. I WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS SELLER. PRICE WAS VERY REASONABLE.
customer_reviews.author: jerry a. todd

customer_reviews.title: Love the size, the build...not so much
customer_reviews.text: This dog house came with high hopes. It is big, the dogs loved it, but the install leaves some room to be improved. Screws came out within days and had to be replaced and the base did not stay attached. Dogs don't mind :) Might be some user error here, so that is why 4 stars instead of 3.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Dansby III

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. I had a little trouble at first but after getting two pieces fitting together without falling on me, the rest was smooth sailing. I ordered this because I have a midsize female about to have her litter. Last time she dug a hole under the porch, this time she has a house of her own and it's big enough for all to fit. This home is gonna be perfect and well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Persnickety

customer_reviews.title: signifcanly damaged on arrival
customer_reviews.text: small broken pieces of the item were falling out of the box while unpacking- cheap plastic cracked/broken in every corner. Completely unacceptable quality, ratings were misleading
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed ... Overpriced too
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had read the reviews. Tried over and over for the sides to click together .... no way. Finally gave up and now a ton of trouble to return. Definitely Overpriced Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: D L Sailors

customer_reviews.title: 150 pound bloodhound
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our 150 pound bloodhound. He can get in and out with ease. I’m pretty sure our 65 pound Plott hound could fit in there with him also. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad could have a better price point being less expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Seems very sturdy for my lab/shepherd mix. She sleeps in it occasionally when she’s outside. This item didn’t come with a door or letters for placing the pet”s name on the house, nor does it have any open ventilation on the top as stated. There’s a vent look alike but it’s just that and it’s not open. It’s only about 2x3. The side pieces were warped so it was a bit difficult to align the pieces as they kept popping back out. I like the base as it’s ease to clean. I use a mop to clean her house after she tracks dirt and sometimes mud in her house.
customer_reviews.author: Divine Indulgence

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for real big dogs!
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty easy to put together. I was able to do it by myself. I have a Great Pyrenees/Karakachan cross and her half grown pup and they both fit in it.
customer_reviews.author: anewton

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH THE PRICE.
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy and roof leaks. Not worth the price. I expected a strong and better quality product. I had to keep it because my new German Shepard puppy had to have a house to sleep in. I patched the roof with a roofing sealant and it doesn't leak now. Will see how long it last.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK for a large breed puppy, but flimsy and came with one part missing.
customer_reviews.text: It will work for the summer, but the plastic is pretty thin, A small part, one of 6, was missing - the little black tabs you put over the top screws. I'll plan on replacing this thing with a REAL dog house in the fall.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher George

customer_reviews.title: Large opening for my tall dog to enter without it hitting her back.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the dog house in the end but it was flimsy and the sides were bowed until everything screwed together. I see there are holes at the opening of the dog house where a door/screen would go and would like to order one but done see it offered.
customer_reviews.author: raymond moreno

customer_reviews.title: Plastic low maintenance large dog house
customer_reviews.text: We took clear silicone and went over ever crack and screw then put a plastic flap door on the front. It's big enough to fit both my basset hound and black lab corgi mix. We will probably put straw underneath for insulation and get a bed for inside for padding and insulation then we should have some happy pups...
customer_reviews.author: cami

customer_reviews.title: This kennel is great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this kennel! I have 3 Great Pyrenees and it's big enough for them to lay in it comfortably! Now I just need to buy 2 more so they each have one!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product but it would be nice to have some type of way to secure the bedding in the dog house to avoid from the dogs dragging the bedding out when ever they exit the house.
customer_reviews.author: Israel Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Large , sort of flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this dog house. I have a large Pitbull and he has plenty of room inside this house. The instructions were easy to follow. The pieces do seem a bit Flimsy, I do not expect this house to last years and years but it will do. It also takes a bit a pressure to get the screws into place, Despite the holes being pre drilled.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Worth webery penny!!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever for our German Shepherd -helibes his new crib!! 🤪 We line the bottom with pin shavings and top with straw for the warmth! Heyu lives in it lol!
customer_reviews.author: Alysia Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Spacious
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 6 month old English Mastiff. However rain does tend to blow inside. Will need a door flap. Overall a great buy. He has growing space inside.
customer_reviews.author: Miss April

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one!
customer_reviews.text: It is very flimsy. There is no ventilation. The rain pours in. So, it's great as long as it's not too cold, hot, windy or raining. But, if that's the case your dog would probably rather stay outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great House
customer_reviews.text: Standing up well to my Rottweiler. She has chewed the corners off the roof but it remains water proof.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy W Chetwynd

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and Dogs lol
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to be honest ! My kids ages 9 to 2 love it ! We live in wet WA state and we haven't put it outside yet ! So my kids and dogs share it ! We have a Boxer and a Yorkie they both go in it too lol
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Russell

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: For a Siberian husky works well although he rarely goes in it, we’ll see if he uses it this winter. I thought the house is sturdy enough and robust enough to last a while. Only down side is the clips to cover the screws on the outside are not well made and have already fallen off in a few spots, seems if you bump them or lay a hand on them they disappear, no biggy though.
customer_reviews.author: Dave F

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: There was a little leak, but we put flex tape on top and no more leak It's sturdy and has pegs for tie down. My dog finally got use to it . Put it together just like the instructions states.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and cheesy. Very flimsy and difficult to put together. Save yourself time and ultimately money by spending more money right out of the gate for a better item. You don't always get what you pay for, but in thos case, you definitely do.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Howes

customer_reviews.title: has a use
customer_reviews.text: flimsy but the sheep can move it about themselves to create shade and the little pygmy goat gets in it out of the rain....but the 100 pound dog prefers the porch...still he does fit in it.
customer_reviews.author: lisa paris

customer_reviews.title: not well built at all
customer_reviews.text: Just awful. Thin plastic. The pieces fit together, but the sides had curved areas and would not slip into place. Very disappointed. I have not used it, in the rain, so I do not know how it performs, but the appearance makes me greatly question it's ability to keep water out. I am very disappointed. I would never want my dogs, in this house, in cold or wet weather. in this house
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping, easy to assemble seems to be holding up well
customer_reviews.author: Cleo Harris

customer_reviews.title: a pretty decent house
customer_reviews.text: On the instruction sheet the picture and instruction relating to which end to fit to the roof first do not agree and should be changed. It makes a big difference. I also had to tape the roof together which made it much easier to fasten the end pieces. Screw holes lined up well and package had ample screws. Overall, a pretty decent house.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Haynie

customer_reviews.title: 85 pound and a 65 pound boxer fit comfortably
customer_reviews.text: This house is just like described. Sturdy and looks beautiful . My two boxers one 84 pound and one 65 pound fit comfortably. They love it 😍
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA CAMINERO

customer_reviews.title: Love this dog house
customer_reviews.text: I have a 130 lb German Shepard and he can walk right in with no problems its held up great I have had it for months now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy warped plastic! This is piece of garbage. I can’t believe I spent actual money on it. It does assemble fairly easily and is spacious, but really? My dog could pick this thing up and drag it away!
customer_reviews.author: thatoneguy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my tortoise
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my tortoise. He loves it. I needed to keep him warm in the winter since he is a desert tortoise. Put in a infrared heat emitter and he survived the winter. He now has a nice burrow also.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Falck

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy plastic with cracked&broken roof
customer_reviews.text: Roof came broken and cracked. The box was all beat up and torn up. Plastic is real flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: SOLITARYSIREN

customer_reviews.title: That our big baby was safe from the weather.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build nice and roomy for my big dog he loves it. Works beautifully when it rained and snowed he was so nice and warm. I tried it out for him in the rain and snow. I made sure he was ok in there. Some times I'm out and the weather is unpredictable and I dont like leave him in a crate so this works AMAZING
customer_reviews.author: 🐌 girl

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: MY DOG LIKES IT WISH IT WAS A LITTLE BIGGER
customer_reviews.author: BRIELLE 😁

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions Stated are NOT Inside Habitable Space ... Sigh...
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as I had hoped. Dimensions stated are (Inches): 41.3 x 38 x 38.8 which represents the OD of the floor/foundation. Secondly, I guess I was expecting panels maybe something like the double walled "Rubber Maid" buildings. Product is constructed of basic, relatively thin, plastic with zero insulation value. All the facts are up front so I am not upset ... just was hoping for a better dog house.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce E Langley

customer_reviews.title: its worth it
customer_reviews.text: is really good price. and is nice little house for my chocolate lab
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Good value in exterior dog house
customer_reviews.text: Bought and use on rear deck for two 50 lb 5-month old puppies. This is great for the deck; would be less sure if on ground. Assembly was pretty easy and parts fitted together with just a little encouragement. The thin walls will not keep house as warm as heavier construction but fit our needs and consider to be a good value. The house will be fine for shielding the pups from chilly winds. Pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Holland

customer_reviews.title: Great doghouse
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love it. Got for a large, medium, and small dog. All 3 fit and love it. They stay in when it’s cold or wet and take turns going in when it’s nice out. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. W. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to assemble for me but I got it in the end . It’s a nice dog house once it’s together!
customer_reviews.author: James Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it, only took about 15 minutes to put together, has worked great in the wind and rain. The vents on the top help on those hotter days.
customer_reviews.author: Tanisha B

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Really good dog house. Doesn't leak. For a 5 star rating it would need better anchors to the ground. Over all quite happy with my purchase. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Steven L.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Light enough to be picked up and moved by one person. Since assembled has been in two moderate rains. Didn't leak.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D

customer_reviews.title: Still in one piece
customer_reviews.text: This product is still hanging. My dog normally chewed the other houses I bought up. I think I had this for about 2 or 3 months and it's still in one piece. With the little rain we had, I don't see any water in the house, so I guess it keeping him dry, but especially keeping him warm.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Th

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Leaked and the dogs wanted nothing to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Envision Foods LLC

customer_reviews.title: super easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I have two 100lb dogs and their old wooden doghouse was falling apart in this Michigan weather. This is plenty large enough and surprisingly easy to assemble. Took 20 minutes max. I also like that it is off the ground and has plenty of support underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Holiday Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Assembled easily and is very nice.....,,,my dog won’t get out of the darn thing. 110 pounds and plenty of room!
customer_reviews.author: Ibuyabunchofstuff

customer_reviews.title: This dog house is perfect for what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: This dog house is perfect for what we wanted. It's big enough for both of our lab puppies to get in at the same time. It arrived on time and was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Nice dog house
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, looks good and my dog loves it. It would have been nice to have the option of purchasing a door with it.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Some of the holes weren’t drilled all the way through and some screws were missing. It was easy to put together but was missing a few screws. I made it work and just got my own drill and made the holes. Overall though it’s a good dog house.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Great product, big enough for big dogs
customer_reviews.text: We liked it and our dog loved it. Very easy to assemble. We have a big dog (Weimaraner) and she fits comfortably in it. I recommend this product !
customer_reviews.author: Josue

customer_reviews.title: Great dog house
customer_reviews.text: This dog house is great. Easy to assemble, good quality plastic. Raised off the ground. Large enough for 2 medium sized dogs (60-75lbs). It is also attractive to look at it. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I got the largest size house and was I impressed with the quality
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Alleva

customer_reviews.title: Putting it together
customer_reviews.text: This dog house is flimsy to put together. It takes 2 people to line up. Don't follow instructions it will take hours. I put sides together with screws first and placed on base. Then put each top piece on separately. Screw as u go. Once finished it was great dog house. It was very difficult to put together. Like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Not too difficult to put together until the base. ...
customer_reviews.text: Not too difficult to put together until the base. Holes are not pre-drilled and the plastic house and base did not align. Had to muscle it together.
customer_reviews.author: jmc

customer_reviews.title: Needs Ventilation!!
customer_reviews.text: The dog house is the perfect size for my Great Pyrenees Pit Bull but it's so hot he won't stay in it. Needs some side windows for ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Joyner

customer_reviews.title: DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE! This house just keeps collapsing and one strong wind blew it completely apart! Don’t waste your money!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mea

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy but effective.
customer_reviews.text: A little flimsy, but worth the cost. Easily fits my male German Shepherd and Female great dane. Putting it together took about 20 minutes by myself.
customer_reviews.author: blake

customer_reviews.title: Nice House
customer_reviews.text: Looked a bit worn/used when it arrived, but other than that my dogs seemed to have taken to it and utilize it when it rains/storms (in conjunction with protection from the covered patio).
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

product_meta.title: Confidence Pet Plastic Dog Kennel Outdoor House
product_meta.description:
Size:Large

The Confidence Pet Plastic Dog Kennel is made of tough and durable plastic for a comfortable, personal space for your pet.

A hygienic way to provide a home out of the home for your dog.

Features

 * Large room and internal volume for your pet
 * Please confirm the product dimensions are adequate to accommodate the size of your pet.
 * Easy assembly
 * Plastic construction

For Medium Dog Kennel

 * Product dimensions (Inches): 29 x 26.2 x 27.4
 * Entrance Size (Inches): 10.4 x 17.3
 * Product weight: 13lbs



For Large Dog Kennel

 * Product dimensions (Inches): 34.5 x 30.9 x 32.1
 * Entrance Size (Inches): 12.8 x 20.6
 * Product weight: 20lbs



For Extra Large Dog Kennel

 * Product dimensions (Inches): 41.3 x 38 x 38.8
 * Entrance Size (Inches): 14 x 24.4
 * Product weight: 30.9lbs
feature_bullets: Great value plastic kennel for your dog
Lightweight kennel to provide shelter from the weather, though note this is not designed to withstand heavy rain, storms or wind and is not insulated
Please confirm the product dimensions are adequate for you size pet before purchase
Assembly is not difficult, but does require two people and a screwdriver/drill which is not included
Size (outer measurements) - 34.5" x 30.9" x 23.1" / Entrance size 12.8" x 20.6"

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
